entities.description: Long-lasting or repeated physical health problems caused or worsened by using inhalants.
Continued use of inhalants despite causing or worsening physical health problems.
Long-lasting or repeated mental health problems caused or worsened by using inhalants.
Continued use of inhalants despite causing or worsening mental health problems.

relationships.description: Relates inhalant use to causing or worsening physical health problems.
Indicates continued use of inhalants despite physical health problems.
Relates inhalant use to causing or worsening mental health problems.
Indicates continued use of inhalants despite mental health problems.

triplets.subject: DPINPHYS

triplets.subject: DPINMNTL
